item.title: I used AI to create this music track
item.description: I don’t know any musical instrument or how to read a score. I never had any type of music education. I may even be a bit tone deaf. So I just went to an AI program and clicked a button. And, this came out. I thought this may be good enough for the music to a game trailer. voil√†.
